text: Marrubiu (Marrùbiu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Oristano in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 4,838 people lived there. Its area is 61.24 km². It is 7 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Oristano
title: Marrubiu
